article: spain will probably begin repatriating on thursday some of the illegal immigrants from sub-saharan africa who have flooded into spanish enclaves in morocco recently , deputy prime minister maria teresa fernandez de la vega announced here .
abstract: spain set to repatriate moroccan illegals
